artist: Artist: Yoshimura Shūzan; Artist: After Kano Tan'yū
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
description: soft-bound book with blue cover; label on cover; copies of images by Kano Tanyu; imagery includes figures, landscapes, dragons, birds, flowers, and horses in a predominately Chinese style
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From Heroic Paintings, Famous Works by Chinese and Japanese (Wakan meihitsu, Gaei 和漢名筆　画英)
text: Copies of famous paintings by Kanō Tan'yū.
title: Heroic Paintings, Famous Works by Chinese and Japanese, vol. 4
